New Records: Brandon Miller scored the most three-pointers (5) in a quarter by a Hornet in nearly 30 years
Key Match Events: Brandon Miller's game-winning three-point shot in the third quarter
Post-Match Reflections: Brandon Miller himself said that the combination of him and LaMelo Ball in the back court is a'scary sight'
Others: The Hornets' starting shooting guard chased down a loose ball, snatching it away from an unsuspecting Indiana Pacer, took one dribble, and launched a prayer from 30-feet that was answered by the basketball gods
